DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate the value of postoperative troponin in the prediction of mid term and long term mortality and morbidity in children with congenital heart disease undergoing cardiac surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Postoperative Troponin in Children With Congenital Heart Disease
DOC.criteria: all children with congenital heart disease between 010 years admitted for elective or emergency corrective or palliative cardiac surgery parental refusal children older than 10 years
